_description: Dual XP System configuration - Combat XP and Knowledge XP with separate level curves and stat growth

combat_xp.description: Combat XP from enemy defeats, increases HP and physical stats

knowledge_xp.description: Knowledge XP from puzzles/lore/dialogue, increases MP and special stats

xp_sources.description: Base XP values for various sources
xp_sources.enemy_defeat_description: Base XP per enemy defeat, multiplied by enemy level and difficulty
xp_sources.puzzle_solved_description: Base XP per puzzle, multiplied by puzzle difficulty (1-10)
xp_sources.lore_discovered_description: Fixed XP for discovering lore items, journals, or story notes
xp_sources.npc_dialogue_description: Fixed XP for completing NPC dialogue trees
xp_sources.area_discovered_description: Fixed XP for discovering new map areas or landmarks

bonuses.perfect_rhythm_combat_description: Combat XP bonus for perfect rhythm timing (+25%)

difficulty_multipliers.description: XP multipliers based on enemy difficulty tier

puzzle_difficulty_mapping.description: XP rewards based on puzzle difficulty rating (1-10)

ui_settings.description: UI display settings for XP and level-up notifications

notes: Level curves are identical for both XP types to keep progression parallel
Combat XP focuses on survival stats (HP, Physical Defense)
Knowledge XP focuses on magical power (MP, Special Attack)
Boss fights grant significant Combat XP to reward challenge
Puzzle exploration grants Knowledge XP to encourage diverse gameplay
Perfect rhythm combat bonus encourages skilled play
Both XP types required for full character power
Players can specialize or balance based on playstyle

integration_notes.s04_combat: Combat system triggers on_enemy_defeated() with enemy data
integration_notes.s17_puzzles: Puzzle system triggers on_puzzle_solved() with difficulty rating
integration_notes.s06_save_load: XP manager provides get_save_data() and load_save_data() methods
integration_notes.s20_evolution: Evolution system may check both XP levels as requirements
integration_notes.s22_npcs: NPC system can call grant_dialogue_xp() on dialogue completion
integration_notes.s23_story: Story system can call grant_lore_xp() when lore items discovered
